citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1100-1130 on
23-Sep-19.
Facility was taken over by a new manager who was not working on the day of the attempted inspection.
